name: Periodic Mayhem Era 1 (Demo)
description:
Welcome to Periodic Mayhem Era1, a platform fighting game up to 4 players. Play as Drynamith, Stayiron, Frank or E.V.I.L. in this demo build of the first main game of the franchise. Play with your friends offline in Mayhem mode, or online in Private Online (matchmaking coming in full release) in this project. Based on the Platform Fighter Engine and largely inspired by Jump Ultimate Stars, have a good time smacking your friends around and causing pure mayhem! Xinput controllers are for best gaming experience!

This is a demo build, and still may have bugs. Please report any bugs in the comments section! Please note that the exe may report as a virus, it is 100% safe and not a virus, please allow it through your antivirus. Also allow access through your firewall for online play. 

Donations are not required but absolutely help make a living from continuing to make video games. Any donations will be greatly appreciated, but again, are not required to play this game.
